function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited access to internet and digital solutions in Least Developed Countries (LDCs)","Impact":"Impedes the adoption of digital solutions and innovations, hindering progress towards Smart City designations","Mitigation":"Investment in infrastructure and digital inclusion programs targeting LDCs, promoting affordable and accessible internet access","Technologies":"Fiber-optic networks, satellite internet, mobile connectivity solutions","People":"Population in Least Developed Countries (LDCs)","Owner":"Government, international organizations, telecommunication companies"},{"Description":"Unprecedented interest and increase in wearable devices and smart body implants","Impact":"Potential risk of privacy and security breaches, data misuse, and vulnerability to cyber-attacks","Mitigation":"Stringent privacy and security regulations, encryption and authentication measures for wearable devices and implants, public awareness and education on data protection","Technologies":"Encryption technologies, authentication protocols, secure data storage solutions","People":"Users of wearable devices and smart body implants","Owner":"Regulatory bodies, technology companies, cybersecurity experts"},{"Description":"Massive availability and utilization of data in urban environments through 6G technology","Impact":"Increased risk of data privacy breaches, unauthorized access, and misuse of personal and sensitive information","Mitigation":"Implementation of robust data privacy regulations, encryption of sensitive data, user consent and data access controls","Technologies":"Data encryption tools, access control systems, secure data sharing platforms","People":"Residents and individuals in urban environments","Owner":"Regulatory agencies, city authorities, technology companies"}]}
